go_fast.title: Go Fast
go_fast.description: Generate videos faster with slightly lower quality

duration.title: duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds.

last_frame_image.title: Last Frame Image
last_frame_image.description: Last frame image for video generation. The final frame of the output video will match this image.

first_frame_image.title: First Frame Image
first_frame_image.description: First frame image for video generation. The output video will have the same aspect ratio as this image.
